articles.author: Jonathan Burgos
articles.title: Philippine Gokongwei Group Exits Australia, New Zealand Snack Foods Business - Forbes
articles.description: Universal Robina Corp. (URC) agreed to sell its remaining 60% stake in Unisnack ANZ to its joint venture partner Intersnack Group, exiting the Australian and New Zealand snack food business to focus on Southeast Asia.
articles.content:
Lance Gokongwei
SONNY THAKUR FOR FORBES ASIA

articles.title: Samsung Named Top Brand In Asia Tenth Year In A Row – Pokde.Net - Pokde.Net
articles.description: Samsung has just announced that they have been named the number one brand in Campaign Asia-Pacific and NielsenIQ’s ‘Asia’s Top 1000 Brands 2021’ study.
articles.content: In the Asia’s Top 1000 Brands 2021′ research conducted by Campaign Asia-Pacific and NielsenIQ, Samsung was named the number one brand. Samsung has been chosen the best brand in the Asia-Pacific area … [+1889 chars]

articles.author: Leika Kihara
articles.title: Asian factory activity hit by rising costs, Delta variant - Reuters
articles.description: Asia's factories hit a rough patch in July as rising input costs and a new wave of coronavirus infections overshadowed solid global demand, highlighting the fragile nature of the region's recovery.
articles.content: TOKYO, Aug 2 (Reuters) - Asia's factories hit a rough patch in July as rising input costs and a new wave of coronavirus infections overshadowed solid global demand, highlighting the fragile nature of… [+3137 chars]
